title: Belzan
description: A relaxed fine‑dining bistro on Smithdown Road, featuring seasonal British dishes with Michelin recognition.

title: NORD
description: Modern restaurant with an eclectic international menu in a sleek, futuristic setting.

title: The Art School
description: Award‑winning fine-dining in a beautiful Victorian building serving inventive Modern British cuisine.

title: Maray
description: Middle Eastern–inspired small plates, craft cocktails, and a laid-back vibe make this a local favourite.

title: Rudy's Neapolitan Pizza
description: Casual pizzeria serving authentic wood-fired Neapolitan pizzas at great value.

title: Mowgli Street Food
description: Indian street food served in a vibrant setting with swing seats and hanging lights.

title: Pattersons
description: Casual chicken and burger joint known for generous portions and quirky style.

title: Dale Street Eatery
description: Trendy brunch and coffee spot popular for artisan plates and quality coffee.

title: Slim's
description: Funky venue serving up stacked burgers, wings, and loaded fries with a cool vibe.

title: Bundobust
description: Trendy Indian street food and craft beer served in a communal dining space.
